ComicInfo.Summary:
Cullen Bunn (Harrow County), Danny Luckert (Regression), and Leila Leiz (The Last Book You'll Ever Read) present a brand-new horror anthology flipbook taking place in a haunted comic book shop with a twisted retailer filled with tales of terror sure to leave you with the lights on. Welcome to the SHOCK SHOP! The terrifying anthology from horror maestro Cullen Bunn concludes with plenty of blood, beasts, and bodies that's sure to want you to read this with the lights on!
